name: Relic of The Past: Colonial Beacon Gas Station
name_original: Relic of The Past: Colonial Beacon Gas Station
description:
Game made in 2 hours for Bitsy Pixel x Paper jam! 

The theme was a random wikipedia page titled: "Colonial Beacon Gas Station". 

The game is about a race of highly advanced flying saucers that evolved from cars over several millenia. They sometimes come back to old historical sites such as this gas station to learn about their primitive ancestors and the mysterious "pilots" that drove them.
